title: Random Line With No Repeat
description: Display line from file without repeating it until they all get displayed

# Import Code
```text

```
# Installation
Import the Code Above to Streamer.bot

# Configuration
in Subactions :
► Set argument %filePath% with the entire filePath including its extension (.txt)
► Customize the Output in the Twitch message , or use %randomLineNoRepeat% variable 

|Command|Purpose|
|---|---|
|`!randomLine` | Default command to test it |

# Example Use
